title: Cep
description: The most colorful representative of the mushroom kingdom. According to some sources, it earned its name because its flesh remains marbled white even after cooking.

title: Chanterelle
description: The chanterelle mushroom has a bright yellow-orange color. That's why these mushrooms can be seen from afar, making them easy to gather. However, in the autumn, they can be easily mistaken for yellow leaves.
